Text:
Hey dude, now that the first phase is ending I think it would be a great time to thank you for the releases. They're in great quality. I truly appreciate them and I believe most people here do too.

Thank you!

Thanks man. I'm quite happy myself - things have gone smoothly. Only one or two spelling errors so far and two reposts. The quality of the media has also been decent since the fifth game or so. 

The performance of the teams and the spirit of the rugby so far have been outstanding. My favorite try so far is the single one Portugal scored against New Zealand, it was a great moment and I am very pleased that I am able to share it.

Yes , many many thanks Frank. All of the matches have been top quality and have retained that quality even after using Nero to convert them back to a DVD playable format. As for the world cup so far, i have been the most impressed by the fantastic effort put forth by the so called weaker teams. Thanks again Frank.

Hi Frank, indeed thanks so much for the effort in uploading every single match! Truely appreciated and quality was excellent. This is the first world cup that I've been able to watch every single match thanks to you :) Looking forward to the quarters!

I agree with the others THANKS A LOT FOR THE GREAT RELEASES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1 What's the plan for the games for example the FRA - NZL from last night, are you going to put those on as well??? If there's anything I can do in return please do write me a message!

Bro, please seed Rugby World Cup 2007springboks' games.
Thanks.

seeders, please come back!!!
there are 4 people stuck on 98.8%

Please don't leave after you finished downloading

http://suprbay.org/showthread.php?p=211906#post211906
If you want any of the SA games seeded leave a message on my latest torrent.
